name: Internal Voice Art Exhibition

address.streetAddress: 399 The West Mall - Etobicoke Civic Centre

description:
Collective919 explores how identity is shaped by cultural exchange. From traditional Korean paper paintings to mixed media, each artistic expression provides a glimpse into the universal human experience of self-reflection.

Join the Artists for the opening reception on Saturday, August 23, 2 to 4 p.m. Light refreshments provided.
